about_the_game:
REVAMPED GAMEPLAY

Gameplay has been rebuilt from scratch in Unreal Engine 5, giving smoother gameplay, flashier special attacks, and an enhanced online experience.

ONLINE CO-OP AND VS MODES

Enjoy local multiplayer with up to four players in co-op or versus modes. Online multiplayer allows for up to six players in co-op and up to eight in versus mode. With cross-platform online play, team up with or face off against players from around the world!

PLAY AS THE ENEMY

Take on the role of powerful adversaries from the Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds universe. From the biggest baddies to minor grunts, a wide variety awaits!

REMASTERED SOUNDTRACK

Players can choose an all-new soundtrack composed by all-girl J-rock band The Phantom Breakers or the classic versions from the original games.

STORY

Tokyo―the capital of Japan.

A mysterious man named Phantom plots to regain his sealed powers.

By giving weaponry known as F.A.s (Fu-mension Artifacts) to the young with special abilities, he lures them into battle with the promise of granting the victor their wish.

However, unbeknownst to the participants, the violent clashes of F.A.s cause distortions in the fabric of space-time, creating rifts between this world and other parallel worlds―

―rifts that will ultimately compromise the seals binding Phantom's powers.

Waka, daughter of the Kumon Family―an ancient clan that has waged war against evils―along with the support of Mikoto, fights to thwart Phantom's evil plan, but despite their combined might, Phantom manages to escape just in time.

While fleeing, he kidnaps Waka's younger sister, Nagi Kumon.

Itsuki, a maid and self-proclaimed Arbiter of Justice and Yuzuha, a ninja who has resisted Phantom's temptations, join forces with Waka and Mikoto to pursue Phantom and rescue Nagi.

name: Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 or AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB or AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB, or Intel HD 5000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6330
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB, or AMD Radeon R9 M470, or Intel HD 6000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate" is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up with the heart of a fighting game, showcasing nostalgic pixel art and the latest cross-platform online multiplayer. Experience the biggest and most expansive entry in the "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds" series to date!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, French, Italian, German, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
